com.ubudu.iot.peripheral

Interface PeripheralManager.PeripheralListener

  • Enclosing class:
    PeripheralManager

    public static interface PeripheralManager.PeripheralListener
    Interface for listening to PeripheralManager events.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onCharacteristicRead(java.util.UUID characteristicUUID, java.lang.String value)
      Event raised when a characteristic has been read
      void onCharacteristicWritten(java.util.UUID characteristicUUID, java.lang.String value)
      Event raised when a characteristic has been written
      void onConnectionStateChange(android.bluetooth.BluetoothDevice device, java.lang.String stateDescription)
      Event raised when connection state with an outer device has been changed.
      void onPeripheralError(java.lang.Error error)
      Event raised on error
      void onPeripheralReady()
      Event raised when peripheral manager is ready for handling connections.

    • Method Detail

      • onPeripheralReady

        void onPeripheralReady()
        Event raised when peripheral manager is ready for handling connections. This means that the BluetoothGattService has been started successfully.

      • onConnectionStateChange

        void onConnectionStateChange(android.bluetooth.BluetoothDevice device,
                             java.lang.String stateDescription)
        Event raised when connection state with an outer device has been changed.
        Parameters:
        stateDescription - connection state description
        device - BluetoothDevice related to the connection

      • onCharacteristicWritten

        void onCharacteristicWritten(java.util.UUID characteristicUUID,
                             java.lang.String value)
        Event raised when a characteristic has been written
        Parameters:
        characteristicUUID - UUID of the characteristic that has been written
        value - new value of the characteristic

      • onCharacteristicRead

        void onCharacteristicRead(java.util.UUID characteristicUUID,
                          java.lang.String value)
        Event raised when a characteristic has been read
        Parameters:
        characteristicUUID - UUID of the characteristic that has been read
        value - value read

      • onPeripheralError

        void onPeripheralError(java.lang.Error error)
        Event raised on error
        Parameters:
        error - error object
